item.title: AIA-18: Exception during XML parsing

Updated Aug 22, 2014 4:51:43 PM
Priority Normal
Type Bug
State Open
Assignee Rob Williams (rob)

Affected versions Unknown

Failed to process
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.io.IOException: Failed to process XML
 at com.ontometrics.integrations.sources.AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider$1.handleResponse(AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider.java:43) ~[AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider$1.class:na]
 at org.apache.http.client.fluent.Response.handleResponse(Response.java:90) ~[fluent-hc-4.3.5.jar:4.3.5]
 at com.ontometrics.integrations.sources.AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider.openResourceStream(AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider.java:35) ~[AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider.class:na]

 at com.ontometrics.integrations.jobs.JobStarter$EventTask.run(JobStarter.java:81) ~[JobStarter$EventTask.class:na]
 at java.util.TimerThread.mainLoop(Timer.java:555) [na:1.7.0_21]
 at java.util.TimerThread.run(Timer.java:505) [na:1.7.0_21]
Caused by: java.io.IOException: Failed to process XML
 at com.ontometrics.integrations.sources.SourceEventMapper$1.handleStream(SourceEventMapper.java:84) ~[SourceEventMapper$1.class:na]
 at com.ontometrics.integrations.sources.SourceEventMapper$1.handleStream(SourceEventMapper.java:52) ~[SourceEventMapper$1.class:na]
 at com.ontometrics.integrations.sources.AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider$1.handleResponse(AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider.java:41) ~[AuthenticatedHttpStreamProvider$1.class:na]
 ... 7 common frames omitted
Caused by: javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException: ParseError at [row,col]:[1,1]
Message: Premature end of file.
 at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLStreamReaderImpl.next(XMLStreamReaderImpl.java:598) ~[na:1.7.0_21]
 at com.sun.xml.internal.stream.XMLEventReaderImpl.nextEvent(XMLEventReaderImpl.java:83) ~[na:1.7.0_21]

Event processing finished

2014-08-22 16:44:59,904 - [INFO] - from com.ontometrics.integrations.jobs.WebContextJobStarter in localhost-startStop-1

item.title: AIA-15: System needs to skip over Events that cannot be parsed
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Aug 22, 2014 12:30:41 PM
Updated Aug 22, 2014 4:47:22 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Open
Assignee Unassigned
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 0.0.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
There are two keys aspects to this behavior:

  • make sure the rest of the events in the current fetch are processed
  • make sure that if we fail on an event that happens to be the last one, we don't resume with it next time and just fail again

Something simple here, a supervisor with a try block.

item.title: HA-677: Job Feed has stopped pulling in ads
item.description:
Reporter Angela Tran (atran)
Created Aug 22, 2014 1:32:42 PM
Updated Aug 22, 2014 1:36:20 PM
Priority Show-stopper
Type Bug
State Open
Assignee Andrey Chorniy (andrey.chorniy)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
We have stopped receiving ads in our feed for both Open Source and Microsoft teams on SEP LA, Zion, Lassen, SEP SF, and Boston. If you look thru–we stopped receiving ads on 8/19 for some and 8/20 for others.

State Open
Assignee Unassigned

For example, the polling interval. Could make a simple web interface. Or just put them in a properties file and add logic to detect changes.

item.title: AIA-16: System needs to have a generalized facility for converting extracted events to messages for posting
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Aug 22, 2014 1:07:49 PM
Updated Aug 22, 2014 1:07:49 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Open
Assignee Unassigned
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 0.0.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
Right now, we are converting all messages in the same way. We should make a simple converter, and then have the ability to have different converters for different event types.

item.title: ASOC-287: All buttons on "Users I Follow" screen must display "Following" button

Updated Aug 21, 2014 11:44:06 AM

Assignee Unassigned

  2. Opened own user profile screen
  3. Clicked "Following" link, "Users I Follow" screen opened

Bug: Only near part of the users "Following" button was displayed, the other part displays "+ Follow" button which is not correct because both users are already followed.

All buttons on "Users I Follow" screen must display "Following" button.

item.title: ASOC-245: Capsule page filter should be a dropdown
item.description:
Reporter Bobby Lincoln (blincoln)
Created Jul 30, 2014 11:16:54 AM
Updated Aug 21, 2014 11:24:51 AM
Resolved Aug 21, 2014 11:24:51 AM
Priority Normal
Type Bug
State Fixed
Assignee Nikolay Chorniy (nikolay.chorniy@gmail.com)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 0.10.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
Capsule page filter is currently a text box, it should be changed to drop down with the following options:

::: other user's capsules filters :::
ALL
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/53d67b56a374b38a686e9ed9/all?limit=20&access_token=

CREATED
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/53d67b56a374b38a686e9ed9/created?limit=20&access_token=

SUBSCRIPTIONS
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/53d67b56a374b38a686e9ed9/createdsub?limit=20&access_token=

::: END other user's capsules filters :::


::: LOGGED IN USERS CAPSULES :::

ALL
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/all?dateOffset=2014-07-26T00:21:56.512Z&limit=20&access_token=

CREATED
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/created?dateOffset=2014-07-26T00:21:56.512Z&limit=20&access_token=

SUBSCRIPTIONS (MY COLLECTION)
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/createdsub?limit=20&access_token=

USERS I FOLLOW
http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/follower?limit=20&access_token=

::: END LOGGED IN USERS CAPSULES :::


::: OFFICIAL CAPSULES :::

http://api.vixlet.com/user/capsule/brand?limit=20&access_token=

:: END OFFICIAL CAPSULES :::

item.title: DMAN-522: After running the estimator, should have option to set that as value program uses
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created May 29, 2014 8:34:53 AM
Updated Aug 21, 2014 11:13:36 AM
Resolved Aug 21, 2014 11:13:36 AM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Fixed
Assignee Noura Hassan (noura)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 1.1.0
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
resolution No resolution
It's confusing to show their most recent lab result, offer to estimate, then after the estimator, just drop them back there to show the recent lab result.

We should ask which value they want to use, or have a way to replace the lab result with an estimate.. ?

item.title: HA-675: Deleting or thumbs downing a lead from the workspace makes the lead disappear from the feed.
item.description:
Reporter Darren Mabashov (dmabashov)
Created Aug 21, 2014 10:52:16 AM
Updated Aug 21, 2014 10:52:41 AM
Priority Normal
Type Bug
State Open
Assignee Rob Williams (rob)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
if a user presses the thumbs down button from their workspace or decides to trash a lead in their workspace the lead will disappear from the feed.

only leads that are trashed or thumbs downed directly on the feed should affect the feed. Leads that are thumbs downed or trashed in a users workspace should have no affect on the feed and therefore the ad should not disappear from the feed.

Type Bug
State Open

User Media Feed
08-21 15:33:42.830 24985-27061/com.ontometrics.parent E/﹕ An exception occurred during request network execution :java.net.SocketTimeoutException

item.title: ASOC-255: "followers" or "following" on profile pages
item.description:
Reporter Bobby Lincoln (blincoln)
Created Aug 6, 2014 7:38:07 PM
Updated Aug 21, 2014 7:58:45 AM
Resolved Aug 21, 2014 7:58:45 AM
Priority Normal
Type Story
State Fixed
Assignee Andrey Chorniy (andrey.chorniy)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 0.10.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
As a user, when I navigate to a user's profile page, I can clicking "followers" or "following" on that profile pages and be taken to a page displaying all the users that user is following, etc.

From this page, I can follow/unfollow users.

item.title: ASOC-274: Location should not be required on final create capsule step
item.description:
Reporter Bobby Lincoln (blincoln)
Created Aug 18, 2014 10:48:52 AM
Updated Aug 21, 2014 7:32:13 AM
Resolved Aug 21, 2014 7:32:13 AM
Priority Normal
Type Bug
State Fixed
Assignee Noura Hassan (noura)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 0.10.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
STR:

1. Navigate to create capsule
2. Enter capsule name and choose icon (leave location blank)
3. Tap continue - advances to second screen as expected
4. Tap "Finish & Create Capsule"

Expected: Capsule is created
Actual: Error, "Location field required"

Location field should not be required on either screen

If more than 3 users like a piece of media and the list is collapse, this list should then be clickable to a list of all the users that like that particular media item. This list can look very similar to the followers list accessed from a user's profile

java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL: 
http://www.glassdoor.com/Job/california-java-developer-jobs-SRCH_IL.0,10_IS2280_KO11,25_IP6.htm

item.title: HA-658: Setup an Akka cluster
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Aug 13, 2014 9:51:37 AM
Updated Aug 20, 2014 1:37:10 PM
Resolved Aug 20, 2014 1:37:10 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Fixed
Assignee Unassigned
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
We need to make it so that:

  • the main instance is configured to create a cluster
  • we have an instance pool that we control through config
  • we can make a new instance and add it to the pool
  • we can tell the geocoding actor to run on that instance

Then we can bring up the dev instance and do a run through.

item.title: HA-661: Install a circuit breaker
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Aug 13, 2014 9:55:39 AM
Updated Aug 20, 2014 1:36:29 PM
Priority Normal
Type Bug
State Submitted
Assignee Unassigned
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
We have to know when we have been banned and then we have to throw the circuit breaker and not allow another request to be sent until the wait period has elapsed. This is for sure why we ended up with a complete ban.

item.title: HA-659: get a new micro instance on AWS that will run the Actors
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Aug 13, 2014 9:52:48 AM
Updated Aug 20, 2014 1:27:51 PM
Resolved Aug 20, 2014 1:27:51 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Fixed
Assignee Unassigned
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
Need to deploy just our actor on that machine, with the Akka cluster runtime.

Here's the good news: micro instance costs ~$10 per MONTH!

item.title: HA-668: New instance request: backend application server
item.description:
Reporter Nikolay Chorniy (nikolay.chorniy@gmail.com)
Created Aug 18, 2014 10:44:23 AM
Updated Aug 20, 2014 1:27:31 PM
Resolved Aug 20, 2014 1:27:31 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Fixed
Assignee Dru Grote (dru)
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
We need a new instance for deploying a backend for Job Spider. It will be responsible for performing address geocoding and job posting scraping. None of these tasks requires storing data on disk, so the new instance does not have to have a lot of disk capacity. It has to run many processes in parallel though, so instance needs at least 2 CPUs.

We reviewed EC2 instance types with their pricing and think that 'c3.large' instance with 3.75 GiB of memory and 2 virtual CPUs will be a good fit.

item.title: HA-657: Introduce clustering so interfacing with remote services occurs on separate instance
item.description:
Reporter Rob Williams (rob)
Created Aug 13, 2014 9:46:41 AM
Updated Aug 20, 2014 1:19:36 PM
Resolved Aug 20, 2014 1:19:36 PM
Priority Normal
Type Task
State Fixed
Assignee Unassigned
Subsystem No subsystem
Fix versions 2.1
Affected versions Unknown
Fixed in build Next Build
aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
Right now, we are making requests of Actors to talk to the systems that we have to talk to in order for us to get the streams of data we need. This is good, because it means that each job has a supervisor and minor failures do not cascade into catastrophic ones. However, all of the actors are on the main instance and now that that instance has a DNS name (insidehire), it is very for people to blacklist us.

Just to be clear: we did something wrong and that's why we got blacklisted by Google, we did NOT exceed the quota, we just hammered them with requests and they shut us down.

Problem is time passed and we were not automatically reinstated. If we had paying customers, that would be a seriously critical problem.

So this ticket covers the most comprehensive way to address these issues. Notice also, the title does not refer to geocoding because if we are going to go to the trouble of getting an Akka cluster working (frankly not that much trouble), we might as well also make the scraping run on it.

item.title: DMIN-314: Create a view to change user's skin type

aggregatetimespent No aggregatetimespent
aggregatetimeestimate No aggregatetimeestimate
resolution No resolution
timespent No timespent
timeestimate No timeestimate
1. Screenshot 1 - this screenshot is an example when we run a search for a company. the list is out of date. We can click on "posted" but the sort fuction does not work

2. Screenshot 2 - this screenshot is an example of when we run an advanced search. the results are out of order as far as the dates are concerned. the system in this case will not allow the user to click on the word "posted" and the spider does not sort by date
